name: Summoner's Handbook
description:
Summoner's Handbook is an asymmetric two player roguelike, where each must summon minions to defend their side of the dungeon, and attack the opposing side. This is a "pure" roguelike in that it has turn-by-turn grid movement, but each side of the dungeon has its own turn cycle so players are not restricted by one another.

There is also a single player defence mode, where 10 waves of increasingly huge hordes attack, while you must summon enough minions to hold them back.

Made for the 7 Day Roguelike Challenge 2019.
